author: {'steamid': '76561198072888615', 'num_games_owned': 2750, 'num_reviews': 540, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1680383392}
review:
Крайне посредственный плоский маджонг. Тайлы заменены на буквы латиницы, проиграть на уровне невозможно, ибо есть бесконечный авторерол тайлов. В конце уровня всегда дают 3 звезды (зачем они вообще?), достижений нет. Выглядит скучно и уныло. 2рой режим с закрытыми тайлами смещает логику решения маджонга в сторону какой то аркады и выглядит не очень. 

Не рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053783918', 'num_games_owned': 1173, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1498943036}
review:
Mahsung Deluxe to interesująca gra logiczna, która polega na układaniu pasujących do siebie elementów na planszy. Gra jest prosta w obsłudze, a jej poziomy stopniowo rosną w trudności.

Plusy:
[list]
[*]Prosta mechanika gry, która jest łatwa do opanowania
[*]Stopniowo rosnący poziom trudności
[*]Duża liczba poziomów do przejścia
[*]Przyjemna grafika i dźwięki
[*]Możliwość ustawienia poziomu trudności
[*]Tania
[/list]
Minusy:
[list]
[*]Brak opcji wieloosobowej
[*]Po pewnym czasie gra może stać się monotonna
[/list]
Mahsung Deluxe to przyjemna gra logiczna, która jest łatwa do opanowania. Gra ma dużo poziomów do przejścia, a poziom trudności stopniowo rośnie. Gra ma przyjemną grafikę i dźwięki, jednak brakuje opcji wieloosobowej. Po pewnym czasie gra może stać się monotonna. Za te 4 zeta warto.

[h1]Dziękuje za przeczytanie mojej recenzji na temat gry Mahsung Deluxe, jeżeli ta recenzja ci się spodobała, przydała podczas zakupu lub poprawiła ci humor - zapraszam do rozdania nagrody lub pozostawienia oceny pod recenzją.
Zapraszam również do przeczytania [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/HyperSonic0/reviews]moich recenzji na temat innych gier[/url].[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198066346696', 'num_games_owned': 2239, 'num_reviews': 1253, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1665718905}
review:
Собирать алфавит этим вашим "необычным" способом? С краю до другого краю? (по геймплею должно стать понятнее о чем я веду речь) С чего вдруг это должно сильно затянуть меня как игрока? Ладно, ребенка вполне может заинтересовать подучить алфавит, все-таки разработчик специализируется на играх для них. Правда не придумывает ничего нового, а с натяжечкой переделывает уже знакомые всем жанры игр. Какие-нибудь приятные глазу изображения было бы в разы интереснее собирать, но здесь прямо шмонит ленивостью (прям как я!). Это я если что про первый мир пока еще...
Во втором мире знаете что происходит? Часть доминошек открыта, а остальные открываются временно по нажатию по ним и игра превращается в запоминалку "найди два совпадения", но усложненную условностями данной игры (когда необходимо собирать именно совпадения по краю игрового поля, которые можно собрать на прокладывании прямых линий). Задумка-то любопытная, но по факту вызывает лишнее раздражение.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116100475', 'num_games_owned': 4783, 'num_reviews': 597, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1601737869}
review:
There is zero relatable mahjong element except for the remotely vague-looking tiles.
No concentration needed. I played it perfectly sleep-deprived while listening to the ingame music
There is almost no puzzle-solving. All you need to do is click on two matching exposed or linked tiles. By any chance if you manage to reach a point where you can no longer make anymore moves, the reamining tiles reshuffle themselves to allow you to complete the round.

No replay value at all. Avoid..

[h1] Only recommended for Idling cards [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198117837119', 'num_games_owned': 3902, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1550207179}
review:
Mahsung Deluxe is a different version of Mahjong where you must connect the tiles by being able to connect them with a line that has no more than 3 segments (2 corners).

As different as this mahjong game is compared to the rest of the games EnsenaSoft have bestowed upon Steam, it is once again another bland, lackluster game that doesn't need another look into. It's a concept of beat a level, move up to the next level, et cetera. There are two difficulties it looks like, but I'd rather not waste any more of my time than I've already wasted. If there's not going to be anything thrilling or game-changing from what they've already given us, it's not worth anyone's time. Move along and find a new game to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172925593', 'num_games_owned': 14023, 'num_reviews': 4533, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1549336464}
review:
一款非常普通的连连看游戏

也就是为了高评价只能傻找，找到没有匹配的牌对让系统自动洗牌
价格挺便宜的，不过玩起来真的比较索然无味

author: {'steamid': '76561198054987356', 'num_games_owned': 948, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1546175685}
review:
Boringly below average mahjong game. Music is repetitive but after 4 hours it started to grow on me as the gameplay certainly did not simultaneously. No indication that there are two seperate modes and the "50" challenges are just 25 repeated with the second time where some of the tiles are hidden for a time limit. Limit is too short to accurately gage where piece are (while half-awake) and the auto reset function when you run out of moves makes life easier so you don't have to completely restart but trivializes the difficulty. Getting 3 stars is all but guarenteed after enough brute force. No settings other than mute the game. 

Definitely not a game you'd want to take seriously especially when it's an asset flip.

Buy Delicious Mahjong instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960955509', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1216, 'last_played': 1594947232}
review: Enjoyable fun puzzle/memory game. First mode is composed of various match 2 tile puzzles of increasing difficulty, where you match 2 tiles with a maximum of 3 straight lines. Second mode is more of a memory game with the tiles hidden by a question mark, which you can reveal for a few seconds by clicking each tile and trying to find a match under the same 3 line rule of the first mode. The second mode becomes more difficult towards the later puzzles as it puts your memory to the test with a larger number of hidden tiles. In both modes, once you reach the maximum possible tile matches in a given puzzle, the remaining tiles will auto-shuffle until you finish the puzzle, which is nice. If you enjoy word search type games or games that test your memory, you should enjoy this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011595325', 'num_games_owned': 2477, 'num_reviews': 929, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1527456456}
review:
Mahsung Deluxe é mais uma alternativa paga de algo que existe melhor gratuitamente na internet trazida ao Steam pela EnsenaSoft. Um jogo de conectar os símbolos que possui uma única chata musica de fundo. Não encontrei nenhuma dificuldade ou variação, e aparentemente você sempre consegue 3 estrelas.
----------------------------
Mahsung Deluxe is yet another paid alternative to something that exist better and free on the internet brought to Steam by EnsenaSoft. A game of connecting symbols that features a unique annoying background music. I did not find any difficulty or variation, and apparently you always get 3 stars.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095001217', 'num_games_owned': 1330, 'num_reviews': 634, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1519225341}
review:
This game describes itself as: Mahsung Deluxe is a unique blend of mahjong, concentration and puzzle solving cleverly combined into a single great game with 50 mind-bending challenges.

1) There is zero relatable mahjong element except for the remotely vague-looking tiles.
2) No concentration needed. I played it perfectly sleep-deprived while listening to music in the background while entertaining friends over skype.
3) There is almost no puzzle-solving. All you need to do is click on two matching exposed or linked tiles. By any chance if you manage to reach a point where you can no longer make anymore moves, the reamining tiles reshuffle themselves to allow you to complete the round.

tl;dr don't buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152048431', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1506764905}
review:
Good game!

If only it could be free...

Basicly the game eats 1h of your time on 1 (of 2) modes.
The first mode is connect two same signs by line with 2 corners or less
The 2nd mode is first one + hidden signs (you discover them by clicking on them, they fade again after 4-5s)

Almost forgot
First mode and 2nd mode maps are EXACTLY the same, so basicly there are 25 not 50 levels + you will get annoyed by 1 (Yes, one) looped music. It would be free flash game back in 2013...

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1495350210}
review:
This tablet port is a spin on the old popular Mahjong tile removal puzzle games.   Unfortunately it maintains none of the charm of even the original Windows Mahjong game.   The tiles look bland and uninteresting.  The graphics are low effort as one would expect from the iTunes app store. 

The gameplay has a couple of frustrating limitations as it tries to reinvent the game but falls very short of even the original. 

Graphics settings are fixed and can't be changed, typical of a low quality tablet port.

Steam has better Mahjong puzzle games, so if you like that kind of game, buy one of those instead of this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018061433', 'num_games_owned': 1510, 'num_reviews': 1588, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1487871250}
review:
Endlich ein Game von "EnsenaSoft " wo nicht alle Level freigeschaltet sind.
Ansonsten interessantes Gameplay. Es gibt 2 Spielmodi, eine Art Mahjong mit Buchstaben nur müssen die passenden Paare in der Nähe bzw eine Linie bilden um sie "einzusammeln". Im zweiten Modus sind paar Buchstaben verdeckt, wodurch noch Memory dazu kommt. 

Das ist natürlich alles nicht aufregend, aber wenigstens besser als andere Games von EnsenaSoft. Es gibt hier schlimmeres Spiele ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197963838914', 'num_games_owned': 1971, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1482413699}
review:
Wie so viele Spiele von EnsenaSoft: Im Ansatz nicht schlecht, aber irgendwie nur schnell zusammen geschustert. Ich frage mich ehrlich, ob bei denen jemand die Spiele selbst spielt, ja nur ausprobiert, bevor sie veröffentlicht werden.

Mahsung ist ein Match2-Spiel, bei dem man zwei gleiche Karten mit einer Linie verbinden soll. Die Linie darf nur zwei mal abknicken. Hört sich einfach an, ist es auch. Im zweiten Spielmodus macht man das gleiche, aber ganz Memory-Like sind die Karten verdeckt.

Hätte man merh draus machen können, ja müssen. Für eine Empfehlung reichts nicht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041512403', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 2465, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1504345527}
review:
같은 패 맞추기.
영어와 한글 초성으로 이루어진 패 중
서로 동일한 패를 연결시켜 소멸시키는 게임입니다.

꺽는 건 2번만 가능.
어렵지는 않기만 힌트 기능이 없습니다.
모르겠다면 상단 왼편의 섞기 버튼을 누르면 됩니다.
물론 별의 수가 줄어들지만.....
